job_history.work_description: Ability to motivate patients to utilize therapy equipment in accordance with their physician's direction. Combined skills encouraging complying with equipment utilization while facilitating an effective and efficient resolution that the patient accepts and can adhere to. Manage all aspects of patient compliance monitoring for a specified regional and/or state demographic using patient monitoring applications and resources.

Respond to telephone, fax and EDI inquiries and orders from referral sources and homecare patients. Document referral request for coordination of care. Provide information on equipment supplies and services. Assist walk-in patients with the selection of equipment, supplies and services.

Receives payment from customers for the purchase of merchandise. Operates a cash register and manages cash to no variances. Provides service to customers. Processes customer sales to include accepting payment, packs merchandise and issues receipts and change.

Supervise a Child Support customer service call center. Duties included maintaining daily statistics of the unit and monitoring daily performance of service representatives and providing constructive criticism to help them improve their skills.

Responsibilities included working with families low-income families to obtain child care assistance. Semi-annual reviews of cases to determine eligibility for assistance. Managing new client orientations and communicating daily with clients about the status of their case.

skills.name: Customer Service
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in customer-facing roles, including customer service associate, customer service supervisor, and senior customer qualification specialist, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Has consistently demonstrated strong communication skills in various roles, including patient health advocate, senior customer qualification specialist, and customer service supervisor, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Problem-Solving
skills.explanation: Has experience resolving issues and providing solutions to customers in various roles, including patient health advocate and senior customer qualification specialist, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience supervising a team in a customer service call center, showing a solid working proficiency in leadership.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Has experience managing multiple tasks and responsibilities in various roles, including patient health advocate and senior customer qualification specialist, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Data Entry
skills.explanation: Has likely used data entry skills in various roles, including patient health advocate and senior customer qualification specialist, but the extent of usage is unclear, suggesting some practical experience.

skills.name: Cash Handling
skills.explanation: Has experience operating a cash register and managing cash in a customer service associate role, suggesting some practical experience.
